def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x,y,z in get3idxs(idxs):
        check_xyz_close = all_close([x,y,z], ctx)
        check_x_large_dark = is_large(x, ctx) and is_dark(x, ctx)
        check_y_large_lightest = is_large(y, ctx) and is_lightest(y, ctx)
        check_z_large = is_large(z, ctx)
        check_x_highest = x == get_top([x,y,z], ctx)
        check_y_lowest = y == get_bottom([x,y,z], ctx)
        check_xyz_tight_cluster = get_distance(x,y,ctx) < 0.5 and get_distance(y,z,ctx) < 0.5 and get_distance(x,z,ctx) < 0.5
        if (
            check_xyz_close
            and check_x_large_dark
            and check_y_large_lightest
            and check_z_large
            and check_x_highest
            and check_y_lowest
            and check_xyz_tight_cluster
        ):
            results.append([x,y,z])
    return results
state = turn(state)
